name: Simple Storage
overview:
Simple Storage is Washington DC’s only full service, apartment-friendly portable storage solution. It’s storage without ever leaving your home.

The whole process is as simple as it gets:

  1. You call Simple Storage at (202) 630 6404 or fill out our easy form at SimpleStorage.com.

  2. Our guys deliver as many empty, recyclable bins as you need. You are then free to fill them at your own pace.

  3. Call Simple Storage again and we’ll be right out to pick up the bins (as well as any other items you want to store) and transport them to our secure, climate controlled facility.

Simple Storage’s goal is to take all of the hard work out of finding a storage solution. Whenever you need some or all of your items back, they can be in hand in as quickly as 24 hours.
